      public static Class forNameWithArray(String className) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Basically the same as Class.forName, but will handle the form java.lang.String[]
      Parameters:
      className -
      Returns:
      The name of the class without the package information.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException

    • getClasspathResourceLocation

      public static String getClasspathResourceLocation(Class relativeClass, String resourceName)
      Contructs a URL string for a resource in the same package as the given class.
      NOTE: the URL string always contains forward slash ('/') seperators, even on Windows
      Parameters:
      relativeClass - Class in the same packing in the resource is located
      resourceName - Name of the resource
      Returns:
      A URL string to locate the resource

    • findAnnotation

      public static <A extends Annotation> A findAnnotation(Class<?> cls, Class<A> annotationCls)
      Locate annotation on java class including deep hierarchy search of all interfaces. Class structure is searched first. If not found and annotation is marked @Inherited, interfaces are searched in listed order, each one deeply before proceeding. If the annotation is present in two or more locations withing the hierarchy, returns the first instance found.
      Type Parameters:
      A - Annotation class reference
      Parameters:
      cls - Class to be searched
      annotationCls - Annotation class being searched for
      Returns:
      Annotation if found, null otherwise
